It is not working!

I have a Macbook Pro running Lion.
I copied the game to my desktop and opened it, but the only thing i get is Wineskin and a black screen.
I waited for a long time, but the game won't start!

Any solutions?

I got it to work. The game isn't that good but if anyone stills wants it then this is what I did:
After I copied the game to my computer. I right clicked it > Show Package Contents > drive_c > Program Files > Euro Truck Simulator > game.exe (NOT game_.exe)
You need an app like CrossOver to open exe files. CrossOver is available on PirateBay. When You open it, a window trying to shut down something may pop up. If it does, then cancel the shutting down. When all is well, click 'Run'. It should work.

thanks mate, this one works well on my iMac with Lion.

starting Wineskin about 30 seconds and it works :)

initially, I dragged the app icon to my applications folder and it wouldn't start; however, dragging it to the desktop instead and opening it from there did the trick. got it working on my macbook pro w/ osx lion. sadly, it's an awful game (unless crawling down an ultra-basic representation of the M25 seems appealing to you).
